description: Ukraine's Early Swallows is a TV hit, giving teenagers the courage to open up about their lives.
title: Ukraine's teen bullying drama that shattered taboos and stirred a nation
title_page: Ukraine's teen bullying drama that shattered taboos and stirred a nation - BBC News
maintext: A key part of the programme is a non-governmental mental health helpline detailed at the end of every episode. Within the first month of the drama going out, the number of calls to the helpline went up by 600%.
